displayName: CIS - Ensure rsh client is not installed
longDescription: Description: The rshpackage contains the client commands for the rsh services. Rationale: These legacy clients contain numerous security exposures and have been replaced with the more secure SSH package. Even if the server is removed, it is best to ensure the clients are also removed to prevent users from inadvertently attempting to use these commands and therefore exposing their credentials. Note that removing the rshpackage removes the clients for rsh, rcpand rlogin.
